name: Google Search Test
description: Test Google search functionality - demonstrates search, result navigation, and content extraction
requirements:
Navigate to Google, search for 'OpenAI GPT-4', and verify that:
1. The Google search page loads correctly
2. The search box accepts input
3. Search suggestions appear as you type
4. Search results page loads with relevant results
5. Results contain titles, URLs, and descriptions
6. The 'Images' and 'News' tabs are accessible
7. Pagination works at the bottom of results
expected_outcomes: Google homepage loads with search box visible
Typing in search box shows autocomplete suggestions
Pressing Enter or clicking search button loads results
Each result has a title, URL, and snippet
Navigation tabs (All, Images, News, etc.) are visible
Next/Previous page links appear at bottom
Results are relevant to 'OpenAI GPT-4' query
notes: Google's UI may vary by region and user. Test focuses on core search functionality.
